meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ayana Matthews Bridget Gallagher Margaret Swanson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6405.

td.p: Ayana Matthews, a geriatric nursing assistent and chef from Baltimore, Maryland
Bridget Gallagher, a fundraising consultant from Arlington, Virginia
Margaret Swanson, a graduate student of architecture from Somerville, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,999)

tr.td: TEXAS-BASED COMPANIES
DIAL M FOR MURDER
COMMON BONDS
LESSER-KNOWN NOBEL PRIZE LIT WINNERS
STARTS WITH 3 CONSONANTS
MILESTONE BIRTHDAYS 2012

tr.td: Margaret
Bridget
Ayana
TAKE ME "N-A" WHERE
(Alex: Each correct response will end with those two letters.)
RED, RED WINE
PHOENICIA PHUN
FLOWERY LANGUAGE
PLAY THEM OFF
KEYBOARD CATS
